mapper.select: SELECT notification_id, receiver_id, notification_type_id, notification_created_at, reference_id,notification_is_read, notification_message FROM notification WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification (receiver_id, notification_type_id, reference_id, notification_message) VALUES (#{receiverId}, #{notificationTypeId}, #{referenceId}, #{notificationMessage});
